decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers:
Location Plan (Drawing No. A(OS)-001 Rev. PL2)
Existing Site Plan (Drawing No. A(SRV)-001 Rev. PL2)
Existing Ground Floor Plan (Drawing No. A(SRV)-100 Rev. PL2)
Existing Roof Plan (Drawing No. A(SRV)-120 Rev. PL2)
Existing Section Plan (Drawing No. A(SRV)-300 Rev. PL2)
Existing Elevation Plan (Drawing No. A(SRV)-400 Rev. PL2)
Proposed Ground Floor Plan (Drawing No. A(GA)-100 Rev. PL3)
Proposed Roof Plan (Drawing No. A(GA)-120 Rev. PL3)
Proposed Elevation Plan (Drawing No. A(GA)-400 Rev. PL3)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
| No part of the flat roofs of the hereby approved development shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with policies 7A  and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan (2013); Draft New London Plan(2019) policies D1 and D4 and policy 7.6 of the London Plan (2016).
description: Single storey rear and side wrap around extension (following demolition of existing rear extension)
